H

hasMaximumpatient() - Method in class pe2.Physician
This method determines if size of physicianPatientList of this physician has reached its maximum(8).
hasMaxVolunteers() - Method in class pe2.Physician
This method determines if physician's volunteerPhysicianList has reached its maximum size (5).
hirePhysician(Physician) - Method in class pe2.Hospital
This method hires a new physician in the hospital.
hireVolunteer(Volunteer) - Method in class pe2.Hospital
This method hires a newVolunteer in the hospital on certain conditions.
hospDirector - Variable in class pe2.Hospital
This instance variable represents the director of the hospital.
Hospital - Class in pe2
This class basically defines a hospital composed of a team of Physicians,Administrators and Volunteer workers, which admits and treats patients on a first-come-first-come basis.
Hospital() - Constructor for class pe2.Hospital
This is the default constructor of this class which initializes all lists defined in this class.
Hospital(Hospital) - Constructor for class pe2.Hospital
This is the copy constructor of hospital class which calls the default constructor.
hospitalPhysicianList - Variable in class pe2.Hospital
This list represents the number of physicians currently hired by the hospital and working in the hospital.The number of patients in this list should not exceed 70.
